flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
用４根翅膀又快又静地飞行。
在被发现之前一口咬住猎物。
一瞬间就把血都吸掉。

４枚の羽で　速く静かに　飛ぶ。
気づかれる前に　獲物を　ガブリ。
あっというまに　血を　抜き去るぞ。

Silent and swift in its four-winged flight, it bites
down on its prey before they realize what’s
happening. In a heartbeat, it drains their blood.

Vola rapido e silenzioso grazie alle sue quattro
ali. Azzanna l’ignara preda e fugge via in un
baleno lasciandola esangue.

Puede volar rápida y sigilosamente gracias a sus
cuatro alas. Se abalanza sobre sus presas y les
chupa toda la sangre antes de que se percaten.

Mit seinen vier Flügeln kann es schnell und leise
fliegen. Ehe seine Beute sich versieht, hat es sie
schon gebissen und ihr alles Blut ausgesaugt.

Il vole vite et sans bruit grâce à ses quatre
ailes, mord sa proie sans se faire remarquer,
et disparaît aussi vite, la laissant exsangue.

用４隻翅膀快速而安靜地飛行。
在被發現之前一口咬住獵物，
一瞬間把血吸得乾乾淨淨。

4장의 날개로 빠르고 조용하게 난다.
눈치채기 전에 먹이를 덥석 문다.
순식간에 피를 뽑아낸다.

４まいのハネで　はやくしずかに　とぶ。
きづかれるまえに　えものを　ガブリ。
あっというまに　ちを　ぬきさるぞ。

耳を　すまさないと　聞こえないほど　小さな
羽音で　ねらった　獲物に　忍び寄るぞ。
後ろ足の　ハネで　枝に　つかまり　休む。

Crobat sneaks up on its intended prey using wings that barely
make a sound. This Pokémon rests by hanging on a tree
branch with its rear legs that serve as wings.

Crobat si avvicina furtivo alla preda con le sue ali
silenziosissime. Questo Pokémon si riposa aggrappato ai rami
degli alberi con le zampe posteriori, che servono anche da ali.

Crobat se acerca hasta su posible presa usando las alas casi
sin hacer ruido. La forma de descansar que tiene es colgarse
de la rama de un árbol por las patas traseras.

Iksbats Flügelschlag ist so leise, dass die Beute lautlos
überrascht wird. Dieses Pokémon ruht sich aus, indem es
sich mit seinen Hinterbeinen an einen Ast hängt.

Nostenfer s’approche discrètement de sa proie grâce à
ses ailes silencieuses. Ce Pokémon se repose en s’accrochant
à une branche avec ses pattes arrière, qui peuvent aussi lui
servir d’ailes.

귀를 기울이지 않으면 들리지 않을 정도로 작은
날갯소리로 노린 먹이에게 살며시 다가간다.
뒷다리의 날개로 가지를 붙잡고 쉰다.

を　すまさないと　きこえないほど　ちいさな
はおとで　ねらった　えものに　しのびよるぞ。
うしろあしの　ハネで　えだに　つかまり　やすむ。

腕か　足の　どちらかだけで　羽ばたいている
ときは　長い　距離を　飛んでいる　証拠。
疲れると　羽ばたく　ハネを　変えるのだ。

If this Pokémon is flying by fluttering only a pair of wings on
either the forelegs or hind legs, it’s proof that Crobat has been
flying a long distance. It switches the wings it uses if it is tired.

Quando Crobat vola agitando soltanto un paio d’ali, quelle
anteriori o quelle posteriori, significa che ha affrontato
un volo molto lungo. Infatti, se è stanco cambia le ali
che sta usando.

Cuando este Pokémon vuela batiendo solo las alas delanteras
o traseras, es porque lleva volando bastante tiempo. Cuando
se cansa, Crobat alterna las alas.

Wenn Iksbat fliegt, indem es entweder das vordere oder
das hintere Paar Flügel bewegt, ist dies ein Anzeichen dafür,
dass dieses Pokémon bereits eine lange Strecke hinter sich
hat. Dann wechselt es die Flügel häufig.

Lorsque Nostenfer vole depuis longtemps, il utilise ses ailes
antérieures ou postérieures en alternance. Il peut aisément
changer de paire d’ailes lorsqu’il est fatigué.

팔이나 다리 어느 한쪽만으로 날갯짓할
때는 긴 거리를 날고 있다는 증거다.
지치면 날갯짓하는 날개를 바꾼다.

うでか　あしの　どちらかだけで　はばたいている
ときは　ながい　きょりを　とんでいる　しょうこ。
つかれると　はばたく　ハネを　かえるのだ。

４枚に　増えた　羽を　使い
さらに　速く　静かに　飛んで
獲物に　気づかれず　忍びよる。

Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and
quietly so it can sneak up on prey without
its noticing.

Con il secondo paio d’ali ottenuto dall’evoluzione,
vola verso le prede in modo ancora più veloce e
silenzioso.

Al contar con cuatro alas, puede acechar de manera
más rápida y sigilosa a sus presas sin que estas lo
perciban.

Dank seiner vier Flügel kann es sich seiner Beute
noch schneller und leiser nähern, ohne dabei
bemerkt zu werden.

Ses quatre ailes lui permettent de voler furtivement
pour approcher ses proies sans les effrayer.

4장으로 늘어난 날개를 사용하여
더욱 빠르고 조용하게 날아
먹이가 눈치채지 않게 살며시 다가간다.

４まいに　ふえた　はねを　つかい
さらに　はやく　しずかに　とんで
えものに　きづかれず　しのびよる。

４枚に　増えた　翼で
暗闇を　静かに　飛んでいく。
となりを　通られても　気づかない。

It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings
that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

Vola nel buio con le sue quattro ali in modo talmente
silenzioso che è difficile notarlo anche se è vicino.

Es tan silencioso cuando vuela en la oscuridad con sus
cuatro alas, que cuesta percibirlo cuando se acerca.

Mit seinen vier Flügeln fliegt es so geräuschlos
durch die Nacht, dass man es nicht bemerkt.

Il vole en silence dans l’obscurité à l’aide de ses
quatre ailes. On ne l’entend pas, même s’il est très
proche.

4장으로 수가 늘어난 날개로
어둠 속을 조용히 날아간다.
주위를 지나쳐도 눈치채지 못한다.

４まいに　ふえた　つばさで
くらやみを　しずかに　とんでいく。
となりを　とおられても　きづかない。

Having four wings allows it to fly more
quickly and quietly so it can sneak up
on prey without its noticing.

Having four wings allows it to fly more
quickly and quietly so it can sneak up
on prey without its noticing.

The transformation of its legs into
wings made it better at flying, but
more clumsy at walking.

La transformation de ses pattes en
ailes a certes amélioré sa capacité
à voler, mais pas à marcher.

The transformation of its legs into
wings made it better at flying, but
more clumsy at walking.

La transformation de ses pattes en
ailes a certes amélioré sa capacité
à voler, mais pas à marcher.

The development of wings on its legs
enables it to fly fast but also
makes it tough to stop and rest.

It flies so silently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed even when nearby.

The transformation of its legs into
wings made it better at flying, but
more clumsy at walking.

A Pokémon that gained vastly
enhanced flying performance by
having its legs turn into wings.

Having four wings enables it to fly
faster and more quietly. It turns
active when the night comes.

It flies so silently through the dark on
its four wings that it may not be noticed
even when nearby.

The development of wings on its legs
enables it to fly fast but also makes it
tough to stop and rest.

Over the course of evolution, its hind legs
turned into wings. By alternately resting
its front and rear wings, it can fly all day
without having to stop.

CROBAT sneaks up on its intended prey
using wings that barely make a sound.
This POKéMON rests by hanging on a tree branch with its rear legs that
serve as wings.

If this POKéMON is flying by fluttering
only a pair of wings on either the
forelegs or hind legs, it’s proof that CROBAT has been flying a long distance.
It switches the wings it uses if it is
tired.

As a result of its
pursuit of faster,
yet more silent flight, a new set
of wings grew on
its hind legs.

The development of
wings on its legs
enables it to fly fast but also
makes it tough to
stop and rest.

It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.
